name: dsexec
description: **dsexec** is a cli helper to help you do a **d**ocker **s**ocket exec in a docker service. **dsexec** will lookup running docker swarm service tasks of the requested **service**, configure a DOCKER_HOST (checking known host & co) context to the remote docker-socket, and spawn you a docker exec of the requested **shell**.
author: 131 <131.code@leurent.email>
